author: Matt Simon
title: Turns Out, Traffic Spreads Like the Coronavirus
description: Researchers use models meant for infectious diseases to show how congestion proliferates. That may mean a vaccine for traffic jams is on the horizon.
content: Just as the novel coronavirus has spread from person to person across the world, so too does traffic propagate through highways and city centers like a contagious disease. From a single crash, congestion ripples through a city, and now scientists have the mod… [+5507 chars]
